segments.transcription: When the ([B 1]) sunlight strikes ([B 1]) raindrops in the air ([SR 3] th-th-th-th-) they ([B 1]) act ([B 1]) as a prism and form a ([B 2])
rainbow. ([MSR 2] The- The- The-) The rainbow is in ([B 2]) ([SR 3] m- m- m- m-) ([SR 3] d-d-d-d-)
([SR 3] d-d-d-d-) division of ([B 1]) white light into many beautiful colors.
([SR 3] d- d- d- d) These take the shape of a long ([B 1]) round arch, ([B 1]) with its ([B 1]) path high above
and ([B 1]) its two ends are apparently ([B 1]) beyond the horizon.
